title: Hoya to Acquire Swiss Lens Manufacturer Knecht & Muller AG
text: By Staff Friday, October 2, 2015 12:21 AM UITHOORN, Netherlandsâ€” Hoya Corp. has reached an agreement to acquire its long-time production and distribution partner Knecht & Muller AG of Stein am Rhein, Switzerland. The agreement makes Knecht & Muller AG the youngest member of Hoya Corp. and the newest addition to the DACH region (Germany, Austria, Switzerland), where the company already has locations in Brunn am Gebirge (Hoya Lens Austria) and Monchengladbach (Hoya Lens Germany GmbH)."In Hoya we found a stable, trustworthy partner who will continue our work and philosophy, and ensure our employees a successful, sustainable future," said the current chairman, Dr. Peter Muller, a member of the family that has run the company for the past century.Following the acquisition, Muller will step down and Oliver Fischbach, general manager of Hoya Lens Germany GmbH, will assume his responsibilities, Hoya said in a statement. Igor Merhar, Knecht & Muller AG's head of business development, will take over as country manager. ALSO RECOMMENDED
